id.description: The unique identifier of the prospect

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the prospect

salutation.description: The salutation or title used when addressing the prospect

first_name.description: The first name of the prospect

last_name.description: The last name of the prospect

email.description: The email address of the prospect

password.description: The password associated with the prospect's account

company.description: The name of the prospect's company

prospect_account_id.description: The ID of the prospect's account in the system

website.description: The website of the prospect's company

job_title.description: The job title of the prospect

department.description: The department within the prospect's company

country.description: The country where the prospect is located

address_one.description: The first line of the prospect's address

address_two.description: The second line of the prospect's address

city.description: The city where the prospect is located

state.description: The state or region where the prospect is located

territory.description: The sales territory assigned to the prospect

zip.description: The ZIP or postal code of the prospect's location

phone.description: The phone number of the prospect

fax.description: The fax number of the prospect

source.description: The original source or channel through which the prospect was acquired

annual_revenue.description: The annual revenue of the prospect's company

employees.description: The number of employees in the prospect's company

industry.description: The industry to which the prospect's company belongs

years_in_business.description: The number of years the prospect's company has been in business

comments.description: Any additional comments or notes about the prospect

notes.description: Any additional notes or details related to the prospect

score.description: The scoring or rating of the prospect based on interactions

grade.description: The grade or ranking of the prospect

last_activity_at.description: The date and time of the prospect's last activity

recent_interaction.description: Information about the prospect's most recent interaction

crm_lead_fid.description: The ID of the CRM lead associated with the prospect

crm_contact_fid.description: The ID of the CRM contact associated with the prospect

crm_owner_fid.description: The ID of the CRM owner associated with the prospect

crm_account_fid.description: The ID of the CRM account associated with the prospect

crm_last_sync.description: The date and time of the last synchronization with CRM

crm_url.description: The URL of the CRM system where prospect data is stored

is_do_not_email.description: A flag indicating if the prospect should not be contacted by email

is_do_not_call.description: A flag indicating if the prospect should not be contacted by phone

opted_out.description: A flag indicating if the prospect has opted out of communication

is_reviewed.description: A flag indicating if the prospect has been reviewed

is_starred.description: A flag indicating if the prospect is starred for special attention

created_at.description: The date and time when the prospect was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the prospect information was last updated
